verbose_text: We performed SOX9 immunostaining and detected an ~ 10% increase in the number of SOX9 + cells in the cerebral cortices and spinal cords of uninjured mice overexpressing astrocytic LZK (XREF_FIG).
evidence: SOX9 +  cells in the cerebral cortices and spinal cords of uninjured mice overexpressing astrocytic LZK
